references.paper_title: An efficiency-based path-scanning heuristic for the capacitated arc routing problem
references.reason: This paper proposes a path-scanning heuristic, a crucial element within the context of capacitated arc routing problem (CARP) solutions, providing a benchmark for comparison against the novel approach.

references.paper_title: Neural combinatorial optimization with reinforcement learning
references.reason: This work establishes the foundation for applying neural networks to combinatorial optimization, providing a critical stepping stone towards the neural network-based CARP solver.

references.paper_title: A comprehensive survey of graph embedding: Problems, techniques, and applications
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of graph embedding techniques, which is fundamental for representing the graph structure inherent in the CARP.

references.paper_title: Semi-supervised classification with graph convolutional networks
references.reason: This paper introduces graph convolutional networks (GCNs), a crucial component of the proposed direction-aware attention model (DaAM) used to effectively learn node and edge embeddings within the graph structure.

references.paper_title: Attention, learn to solve routing problems!
references.reason: This paper introduces the use of attention mechanisms in solving routing problems, a key concept used and adapted within the DaAM for efficient arc selection and path planning.
